intension: Create a graphic design that promotes a vegan lifestyle and emphasizes the importance of natural and healthy eating habits.
globalcaption: The image features a dining table with two cups placed on it. The cups are filled with a green liquid, possibly tea, and are positioned close to each other. The table also has a bamboo placemat underneath the cups, adding a touch of elegance to the setting. The scene appears to be a cozy and inviting display of vegan lifestyle items.
keywords: vegan, food, vegetarian, healthy, organic, green, fresh, vegetable, diet, natural, health, nature, eco, nutrition, veggie, bio, ecology, product, lunch, meal, cooking, dish, hand, lifestyle, post

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a green square placed in the center. The square is surrounded by a white border, making it stand out against the white background. The green square appears to be the main focus of the image, with the white background providing a clean and minimalist look

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a dining table with a green mat on it. On the mat, there are three cups, each containing a green liquid, possibly tea. The cups are arranged in a row, with one cup on the left side, another in the middle, and the third cup on the right side of the mat. The table appears to be a part of a larger setting, possibly a dining area or a living space
